author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Enable running tests in parallel using runspaces with new `-UseRunspacePool` switch.

Still TODO: support UnElevate and merging NUnit logs to a single log.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Does that make sense on slow CI VMs?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @iSazonov that's part of the experiment I'm trying to figure out.  I think even with 1 virtual core, there is enough wait time that having a second thread running may help.

comments.author: stale[bot]
comments.body: This PR has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had activity in the last 30 days. It will be closed if no further activity occurs within 10 days. Thank you for your contributions.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Closing for now as no work is happening for this.

title: [wip] Parallel test execution for start-pspester
